## Bio


PhD an M.S. in statistics from [Iowa State University](https://www.stat.iastate.edu/), 

B.S. in mathematics from [Lawrence University](https://www.lawrence.edu/academics/college/mathematics). 

My PhD adviser was [Heike Hofmann](https://github.com/heike), and 

my dissertation focused on visualization techniques for explainability of machine learning ([Visual diagnostics for explaining machine learning models](https://dr.lib.iastate.edu/items/abac51d2-c05b-4ef2-90f5-03740ff5c682)). 

I currently work for [Sandia National Laboratories](https://www.sandia.gov/) as a research and development statistician.
